title: Integrate PhonePe QR code payment for phone number 9392412728

requirements.text: Display the PhonePe QR code image (from the uploaded screenshot) on the subscription payment page so users can scan it to pay the subscription amount directly to phone number 9392412728

quotes: Ok to the subscription payment are created for the this number "9392412728" or this scanner to work on frontend and backend

acceptanceCriteria: The PhonePe QR code image is displayed prominently on the subscription payment page
The QR code is large enough to be easily scanned by mobile payment apps
Users can see that scanning this code will send payment to the phone number 9392412728
The QR code image is rendered from the uploaded screenshot as a static asset

requirements.text: Store the phone number 9392412728 as the default payment recipient number in the backend for all subscription payments

quotes: to work on frontend and backend

acceptanceCriteria: The phone number 9392412728 is stored as a constant or configuration value in the backend
All payment records reference this phone number as the recipient
The phone number is used when generating payment confirmation messages

requirements.text: Add payment instructions on the subscription page explaining that users should scan the QR code using PhonePe/Google Pay/Paytm apps to complete the ₹5 weekly subscription payment to phone number 9392412728

quotes: this scanner to work on frontend

acceptanceCriteria: Clear step-by-step instructions are displayed near the QR code

The recipient phone number 9392412728 is visible to users

requirements.text: Update payment confirmation workflow to mention that payments were sent to phone number 9392412728 after users complete the QR code scan payment
acceptanceCriteria: Payment success messages display the recipient phone number 9392412728

Users receive confirmation that their payment was directed to the correct number

constraints: Do not modify existing Internet Identity authentication system
Do not change the backend schema for existing user and subscription tables
Preserve existing withdrawal system with phone number field for admin withdrawals
Keep the ₹5 weekly subscription price unchanged
nonGoals: Automated payment verification via UPI API
Real-time SMS notifications to phone number 9392412728
